channel.title: Machine Learning on Antonin Raffin | Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Antonin Raffin | Homepage

item.title: Stable Baselines
item.description: Stable Baselines is a set of improved implementations of Reinforcement Learning (RL) algorithms based on OpenAI Baselines. Github repository: https://github.com/hill-a/stable-baselines You can read a detailed presentation of Stable Baselines in the Medium article

item.title: Racing Robot
item.description: Autonomous toy racing car. CAMaleon team at the Toulouse Robot Race 2017. Humbavision team at IronCar. Medium article: https://medium.com/@araffin/autonomous-racing-robot-with-an-arduino-a-raspberry-pi-and-a-pi-camera-3e72819e1e63 Video of the car: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhI71ZdSh6k
